trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ScrollContentPresenter class provides support for styling the various components of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 展開 ScrollContentPresenter 類別提供用來設定樣式的各種元件支援<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For information about the scrolling region inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關內<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>捲軸的區域資訊

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer"></xref> on which adorners are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer"></xref>呈現在哪一個裝飾項。

trans-unit.source: Adorners are rendered under the clip region of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter> object.
trans-unit.target: 裝飾項會轉譯的裁剪區域底下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer"></xref> on which adorners are rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.AdornerLayer"> </xref>呈現在哪一個裝飾項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the content, if it supports <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"></xref>, should be allowed to control scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否內容，如果支援<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"> </xref>，才可以將控制捲動。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content is allowed to scroll; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果內容可以捲動，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> value indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref> acts as the scrolling client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>值，指出<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref>做為捲動的用戶端。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.CanContentScroll*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.CanContentScroll*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.CanContentScroll*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以水平軸上捲動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if scrolling is possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果捲動否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the vertical axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以在垂直軸上捲動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if scrolling is possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果捲動否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 取得範圍的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: The vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 範圍的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 取得範圍的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 範圍的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 取得捲動內容的水平位移。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ExtentWidth%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介於零和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ExtentWidth%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ViewportWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ViewportWidth%2A>減號</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ExtentWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: 水平位移。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref> content downward by one line.
trans-unit.target: 捲動<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref>內容向下一行。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref> content to the left by a predetermined amount.
trans-unit.target: 捲動<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref>內容向左預先決定的數量。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref> content to the right by a predetermined amount.
trans-unit.target: 捲動<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref>內容向右預先決定的數量。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref> content upward by one line.
trans-unit.target: 捲動<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter"></xref>向上依據一行內容。

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: 強制內容捲動直到的座標空間<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>物件為可見。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the returned <xref:System.Windows.Rect> is a transformed version of the input rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，傳回<xref:System.Windows.Rect>是轉換的過的輸入矩形。</xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, such as when the input rectangle cannot fit entirely within the viewport, the return value may be smaller.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，例如當輸入的矩形無法完全容納於內檢視區中，傳回的值可能較小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>變成可見。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 識別要顯示之座標空間的周框。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the visible region.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>表示可見區域。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls down within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下滑鼠的滾輪按鈕之後，請在內容中向下捲動。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls left within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下滑鼠的滾輪按鈕之後，在內容中左捲動。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls right within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下滑鼠的滾輪按鈕之後，請在內容中的向右捲動。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls up within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下滑鼠的滾輪按鈕之後的內容中向上捲動。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an internal process or application calls <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>, which is used to build the visual tree of the current template.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的內部處理序或應用程式進行呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>，用來建置目前範本的視覺化樹狀結構。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls down within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 向下捲動一頁的內容中。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls left within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 左捲動內容一頁。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls right within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 在內容中的向右捲動一頁。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls up within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 向上捲動一頁的內容中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>控制捲動行為的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>控制捲動行為的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount of horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: 設定水平位移量。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which content is horizontally offset from the containing viewport.
trans-unit.target: 內容為水平位移從包含檢視區的程度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount of vertical offset.
trans-unit.target: 設定垂直位移量。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which content is vertically offset from the containing viewport.
trans-unit.target: 內容處垂直位移從包含檢視區的程度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 取得捲動內容的垂直位移。

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 捲動內容的垂直位移。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ExtentHeight*> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.ViewportHeight*>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介於零和<> *> 減去<> *>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: 取得此內容檢視區的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: The vertical size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: 此內容中檢視區的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: 取得此內容檢視區的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: 此內容中檢視區的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。
